original_text: And you shall accept no ransom for him who has fled to his city of refuge, that he may return to dwell in the land before the death of the high priest.
korean_text: 또 도피성에 피한 자는 대제사장이 죽기 전에는 속전을 받고 그의 땅으로 돌아가 거주하게 하지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And you shall accept no ransom
for him who has fled to his city of refuge
that he may return to dwell in the land
before the death of the high priest.
